summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of the certificates section in About page. All features working perfectly including modal functionality, responsive design, and styling consistency.
passed_tests: My Certificates section visible on /about page
Frontend Development subsection with 2 certificates (React Advanced Certificate, Responsive Web Design)
Backend Development subsection with 2 certificates (Java Spring Boot Professional, REST API Development)
Certificate images and names display correctly
Modal opens when clicking on certificates
Click outside modal to close works
Responsive design works on desktop (1920x1080), tablet (768x1024), and mobile (390x844)
Consistent dark theme styling with orange (#F5A623) accents
All data-testids properly implemented for testing
Navigation to About page works correctly
Hover effects and animations work properly
